thread.section_title: Hotel De Nell - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Lovely area in Paris
thread.title_full: Lovely area in Paris - Review of Hotel De Nell, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: giorgio100
title: Lovely area in Paris
text:
We only stayed one night, and it was not enough.
Xavier and the team at front of house were very welcoming and accommodating. The room lovely, clean, very functional and I loved the bath/shower amenities.
We had a wonderful dinner in the restaurant with great wine.
I am going back later in the year, and will stay here for sure!
